verses.name: Acts 16:22
verses.text: And the multitude rose up together against them: and the magistrates rent off their clothes, and commanded to beat them.

verses.name: Acts 16:23
verses.text: And when they had laid many stripes upon them, they cast them into prison, charging the jailor to keep them safely:

verses.name: Acts 16:24
verses.text: Who, having received such a charge, thrust them into the inner prison, and made their feet fast in the stocks.

verses.name: Acts 16:25
verses.text: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed, and sang praises unto God: and the prisoners heard them.
